mapper.select: SELECT a.acct_no acct_no, a.acct_type acct_type, a.appl_type appl_type, c.iso_code iso_code, a.branch_no,a.title_1 titulaire,a.status, 'DP' dpLn FROM sa.dp_acct a, sa.dp_display d, sa.ad_gb_crncy c WHERE a.acct_no = #{acctNo} AND a.acct_no=d.acct_no and d.crncy_id = c.crncy_id
